mainInfoCards.title: Our Heritage
mainInfoCards.desc: Liepaja Northern Shipyard was founded in 1900 initially as ship-repair workshops of military port of Libau (Liepaja) and is one of the oldest shipyards in the region of the Baltic Sea.

mainInfoCards.title: Maritime Expertise
mainInfoCards.desc: It has been one of the main repair bases for the Navy fleet at the Baltic Sea for many years. Our Shipyard has wide experience in repairs of the various types of vessels.

mainInfoCards.title: Prime Location
mainInfoCards.desc: Liepaja is nonfreezing port situated on the eastern coast of the Baltic Sea, having very favourable geographical arrangement.  It is close to the Western Europe and has the advanced transportation network.
